TopicTitle: Sorting kerbonaut list to prevent jeb from being chosen first

Articles.Content: So yeah worded weird but theres no way I can find to change the order of the astronauts, ie its always jeb bill and bob up top. Sometimes I forget to change the kerbal before launch meaning I have to revert choose someone else and relaunch. I wish I could set up the list so I can keep "throw away" kerbals uptop and save the stars for the big missions.

This is a great idea.

Much as I like having Bill around, I'd also like to be able to start with an entirely random trio rather than the classic three. Although I suppose I could kill them right off the bat...
I suppose you could do a bit of save file magic to make this happen now, but it would indeed be neat to do it with no save file hacking.
IIRC you can drag the kerbonaults order on the list, and they will remain that way

I sort of like it that way, for my own entertainment, but I see how it could get irritating for others.

Perhaps we could have another two fields added to the astronaut database: 'number of missions' and 'last mission date'. Then you could sort your astronaut list to select the most/least experienced crew or the crew that flew most/least recently.
I just like using ones with high courage and stupidity for test launches, more realism.
